h2_title: All 6 Black Myth: Wukong Buddha's Eyeball Locations
h3_title: Black Myth: Wukong Buddha's Eyeball 5 Location
content: A little further on, on the left side of the area, you will see a covered area of the cave with some more Blazebones. This is before the Rockrest Flat Shrine. On your left, there will be a path curving up to another caved area.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Buddha's_Eyeball_Locations.md', within the main section titled 'Buddha's Eyeball Locations', specifically from the subsection 'All 6 Black Myth: Wukong Buddha's Eyeball Locations' and the sub-subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Buddha's Eyeball 5 Location'.
The content is as follows:
A little further on, on the left side of the area, you will see a covered area of the cave with some more Blazebones. This is before the Rockrest Flat Shrine. On your left, there will be a path curving up to another caved area.
